# cyral_integration_elk (Resource)

CRUD operations for ELK integration



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **es_url** (String) Elastic Search URL
- **kibana_url** (String) Kibana URL

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
